org.apache.flink.runtime.dispatcher

类 Dispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.RpcEndpoint
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.FencedRpcEndpoint<DispatcherId>
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.dispatcher.Dispatcher
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DispatcherGateway, LeaderContender, FencedRpcGateway<DispatcherId>, RpcGateway, RestfulGateway
    直接已知子类:
    StandaloneDispatcher

    public abstract class Dispatcher
extends FencedRpcEndpoint<DispatcherId>
implements DispatcherGateway, LeaderContender
    Base class for the Dispatcher component. The Dispatcher component is responsible for receiving job submissions, persisting them, spawning JobManagers to execute the jobs and to recover them in case of a master failure. Furthermore, it knows about the state of the Flink session cluster.

    • 方法详细资料

      • postStop

        public void postStop()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: RpcEndpoint
        User overridable callback.

        This method is called when the RpcEndpoint is being shut down. The method is guaranteed to be executed in the main thread context and can be used to clean up internal state. IMPORTANT: This method should never be called directly by the user.

        覆盖:
        postStop 在类中 RpcEndpoint
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs. The exception is returned as result of the termination future.

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: RpcEndpoint
        Starts the rpc endpoint. This tells the underlying rpc server that the rpc endpoint is ready to process remote procedure calls. IMPORTANT: Whenever you override this method, call the parent implementation to enable rpc processing. It is advised to make the parent call last.
        覆盖:
        start 在类中 RpcEndpoint
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - indicating that something went wrong while starting the RPC endpoint

        Requests job details currently being executed on the Flink cluster.
        指定者:
        requestJobDetails 在接口中 RestfulGateway

        includeRunning - true if running jobs shall be included, otherwise false

        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:

      • requestJob

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<AccessExecutionGraph> requestJob(JobID jobId,
                                                                               Time timeout)
        从接口复制的说明: RestfulGateway
        Requests the AccessExecutionGraph for the given jobId. If there is no such graph, then the future is completed with a FlinkJobNotFoundException.
        指定者:
        requestJob 在接口中 RestfulGateway
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job whose AccessExecutionGraph is requested
        timeout - for the asynchronous operation
        返回:
        Future containing the AccessExecutionGraph for the given jobId, otherwise FlinkJobNotFoundException

      • removeJob

        private void removeJob(JobID jobId,
                       boolean cleanupHA)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Cleans up the job related data from the dispatcher. If cleanupHA is true, then the data will also be removed from HA.
        参数:
        jobId - JobID identifying the job to clean up
        cleanupHA - True iff HA data shall also be cleaned up
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • clearState

        private void clearState()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Clears the state of the dispatcher.

        The state are all currently running jobs.

        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • recoverJobs

        private void recoverJobs()
        Recovers all jobs persisted via the submitted job graph store.
